marklogic.body: Zimmerman was handcuffed, taken to the police station, questioned, and the report was forwarded to the prosecutors office with recommendation to charge him - how is that different than being arrested? Â How can MSDNC continue to give someone inciting violence a prominent platform on their network? Â Are they a wholly ownedÂ subsidiaryÂ of Media Matters now? Â How bad is this going to get when the election season Heats up and he has something else to be ticked Off about?
